comment: He was not helpful at all during his lectures. His test were hard & he didn't like answering questions involving finance problem solving even though he was teaching a Corporate Finance class. He was very mean and hard to talk to as a professor that should be willing to help his students to understand the material. Don't take him if you can avoid it
Dr. Guzman has relatively hard tests and projects.  He is knowledgeable and knows his subject.  Good teacher but maybe a bit on the difficult side.

He is very kind prof. he will talk a lot and clarify concepts. I got really interested in OS because of him. However, class can be long and boring because he uses PowerPoint a lot. Tests are not hard at all. Projects can be confusing but he'll give u a lot of slack.
don't know what the heck he is teaching.

Guzman is an ok guy although he is pretty demanding with his tests. He is prob the brighteset prof I've had but he is also a little arrogant prob from dealing with ignorant students for to long. You can learn alot from if you pay attention and ask him questions when you need to. Bottom line you have
